sourcesContent:
import axios from 'axios'; import React from 'react'; import classes from "./Users.module.css" const Users = (props) => { if(props.users.length === 0){ axios.get('https://social-network.samuraijs.com/api/1.0/users').then; props.setUsers([ {id:1, fullName: 'Mike', photoUrl: "https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/2881220369/2b27ac38b43b17a8c5eacfc443ce3384_400x400.jpeg", followed: false, status: 'hey', location:{ city:'Minsk', country: 'Belarus' } }, {id:2, fullName: 'Lena', photoUrl: "https://news.liga.net/images/general/2019/09/11/20190911155211-5324.jpg?v=1568211567", followed: true, status: 'I am super', location:{ city:'Minsk', country: 'Belarus' } }, {id:3, fullName: 'Jorg', photoUrl: "https://img.gazeta.ru/files3/401/13283401/upload-010-pic905v-895x505-38844.jpg", followed: false, status: 'Not follow me', location:{ city:'Minsk', country: 'Belarus' } }, {id:4, fullName: 'Kir', photoUrl: 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/proxy/hCogOPDZe8UbaXKapbsudS76dajLFf9Au8N51uQlVDCGTYc07wHvHITHMOs8X3sBM0pWEjZLGvLA17kLG1faAaDSnGE', followed: true, status: 'I am going to vacation', location:{ city:'Minsk', country: 'Belarus' } } ]) } return
{ props.users.map(user =>
{user.followed ? : }
{user.fullName}
{user.status}
{user.location.city}
{user.location.country}
) }
(
Mike
Lena
Jorg
) } export default Users;
